<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// On Windows we can fail to open a cache file with a permission denied</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// error. This generally means that another process has requested to delete</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// On POSIX systems, this will atomically replace the destination if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it already exists. We try to emulate this on Windows, but this may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fail with a permission denied error (for example, if the destination</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is currently opened by another process that does not give us the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sharing permissions we need). Since the existing file should be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// semantically equivalent to the one we are trying to write, we give</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// AddBuffer a copy of the bytes we wrote in that case. We do this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instead of just using the existing file, because the pruner might</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// delete the file before we get a chance to use it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> E = TempFile.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/tempfile/#ad0b321ee190fd8f67b1f1792b30ff998">keep</a>(ObjectPathName);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">        E = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3285d0c2736154c3ea72dbecaa446eec">handleErrors</a>(std::move(E), &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ecerror">ECError</a> &amp;E) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::error&#95;code EC = E.convertToErrorCode();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EC != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59739a4f15fb2ec57a6b7fcfe938546bae8ee838822072f02738dbd7d97ea03fc">errc::permission&#95;denied</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad10875fd499e8e285aaeef615e9b11aa">errorCodeToError</a>(EC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MBCopy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer/#a32d2c9ba9019e6e41605c60acd06bd09">MemoryBuffer::getMemBufferCopy</a>((&#42;MBOrErr)-&gt;getBuffer(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                       ObjectPathName);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">          MBOrErr = std::move(MBCopy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: should we consume the discard error?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aee0e70be66536b9ef7b65ae2e5a45959">consumeError</a>(TempFile.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/tempfile/#ac804c3ad178df1dd809e2232f9837e50">discard</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (E)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Failed to rename temporary file &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">                             TempFile.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/tempfile/#a71e2844783eeee86b99de4edaaefed5a">TmpName</a> + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; to &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> + ObjectPathName + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba83a013c55b19255697393a10d9165e">toString</a>(std::move(E)) + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">        AddBuffer(Task, <a href="/docs/api/structs/modulename">ModuleName</a>, std::move(&#42;MBOrErr));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">               -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected</a>&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;CachedFileStream&gt;&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create the cache directory if not already done. Doing this lazily</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ensures the filesystem isn&#39;t mutated until the cache is.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write to a temporary to avoid race condition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;64&gt;</a> TempFilenameModel;</Highlight></CodeLine>
